categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Untirrka was a captain in the Imperial Navy for the Galactic Empire sometime after 4 ABY. He commanded the Imperial Patrol Craft Cutlass. His ship was hastily sent out to intercept the Argent Lady, a freighter believed to be unarmed and smuggling contraband. The Cutlass intercepted the Argent Lady around the second moon of Sev Tok and proceeded to fire a warning shot across the bow of the ship and demanded that the ship power down for inspection.

Untirrka was created by Thomas Bowling for the article Droids Defiant that was published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 9 in February 1996. It was published as a supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game created by West End Games.
